children.markdown:
Two things you should really look at today:

Steve Jackson, more widely known as ourman, has written a great post [rethinking the way that newspapers should be run](http://ourmanonplanetearth.com/2009/04/27/social-media-newspaper/).

And, as highlighted by [Martin](http://www.itsdevelopmental.com/2009/04/video-guardian-editor-alan-rusbridger-on-future-of-journalism.html), and originally produced by [a German site](http://carta.info/8659/alan-rusbridger-journalismus-muss-sich-veraendern-um-relevant-zu-bleiben/), this video of *Guardian* editor Alan Rusbridger talking about journalism is thought-provoking viewing. The really juicy stuff starts about 1:53 in:

[Alan Rusbridger on the Future of Journalism](http://vimeo.com/4359127) from [Carta](http://vimeo.com/user1191984) on [Vimeo](http://vimeo.com/).
